reviews.review_msg: Likes to elaborate from the lecture slides, paying attention in class is very important. Don't take this class unless you're in communications, topics are pretty boring - all about policy and regulation. TA's are helpful, Salama is amazing.

He doesn't explain any of his concepts clearly and expects us to understand how his lectures are related to the class when they are almost entirely separate material. He seems like a nice guy, but definitely not a nice prof and not an easy marker.
